description:
sent to the api/loanplans/update/{{id}} endpoint with a body containing data (category_id, name, title),
      the returned status code should be 401, and the error message in the request body should be verified as
      "Unauthorized request"

steps.name: *  The API user sets "api/loanplans/update/158" path parameters
*  The API adminuser prepares a POST request with invalid authorization information and correct data (category_id, name, title)
*  The API user verifies that the status code is 401
*  The API admin verifies that the message information in the response body is "Unauthorized request"
